meaningMnemonic: You can <radical>see</radical> <radical>gold</radical> if you <radical>stand</radical> in front of a <kanji>mirror</kanji>. Yes, you are made of gold. You’re so great and valuable, standing in front of that mirror. It’s not hard to see, especially in a mirror – you’re golden.
readingMnemonic: Your name is Amy and you are the CAG (Commander, Air Group) of the Battlestar Galactica. People call you <reading>CAG Amy</reading> (かがみ). You have so many gold medals on you that you’ve earned the nickname “Golden CAG Amy.” You like to look at yourself in the <kanji>mirror</kanji> and admire yourself.
